item.title: Ben Sasse, Former Nebraska Senator, Shares Terminal Pancreatic Cancer Diagnosis
item.description: Mr. Sasse, a former senator from Nebraska, announced that he had received a diagnosis last week for Stage 4 pancreatic cancer.
